messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

and git user creation pm re git create hello please add ad thank regards pm git create dear kindly assist requires form attached apologies late escalation tomorrow morning ticker logged via self template got thank much regards analyst ext hub thursday has assigned hello please advised record number has assigned please review details take appropriate action summary requested item details null choose template applicable git create please provide short description git create details wish keep archive attached form rights add based volunteering involved provide acceptance thank add requested location please link kind regards ref msg

message.reasoning:

I'm keeping the allowed list in mind to pinpoint the best fit, and so far I am leaning towards "Access" or "Internal Project". I'll analyze this further.
